data.title: video – Julia Art Photography
data.text:
Júlia is kind to the children and empathetic with complicated situations with the little ones. I appreciate her flexibility in taking the necessary time with my children’s hehehehe.

My twins posed for her two years in her third and fourth birthdays, they just hugged her, they felt comfortable. Today we live in the US but I certainly hope to be close to her again to be able to have more works of art from her hand.

I received the work done as what it is… A magnificent work of art.

I decided to do the photo session with Júlia, because I saw her work she did with my niece and I really liked it. She took photos of my eldest and youngest son, and they were spectacular, the unbeatable treatment, the affection, and of course the work.

Upon receiving the photos, hair stood on end, a great reflection of her dedication of that special and magical day. I thank her for her professionalism and for being the way she is.

I will repeat soon.

Thank you Júlia for immortalizing moments, smiles, …

We didn’t like the typical communion photos and I found Júlia by chance on Instagram. Seeing her photos, we were amazed at how beautiful and original they were, nothing to do with what we have seen so far.

It was a great experience; we had a great family afternoon to remember.

Everyone has said that the photos are beautiful and very original in unique landscapes.

Both Julia and Merche are great with children. We would choose her again, without a doubt.
